text: @realDonaldTrump @lightning_grl #coronavirus #SenateLive need question .  Decisions on opening or not are based on risk assessments of both the virus spread verses health and economic issues with not opening.  How do you weigh theses in decisions to open?  Would different people evaluate this differently ?
